main.name: Shreyansh Shrey
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

work.title: Backend Developer
description: • Automated their interview scheduling process using node.js and google api services which reduced their hiring time in half
• Developed a real-time video call service between doctor and patient using webRTC and socket.io which was an important component of their flagship offering
• With the aid of mongoose and indexing on MongoDB, we implemented a medication search API service that allowed our users to discover medicine 25% faster
• Wrote unit tests for the API services using Mocha chai which made services more robust and production-ready
• Integrated Prometheus and Grafana for the AWS EC2 servers which helped the developers in catching errors faster and in tracking the health of the servers

work.title: Full Stack Developer
description: • Worked on developing a frontend platform for their flagship product MIDAS using React.js and Redux which helped the stakeholders to visualise their data and made their decision making 75% faster with 95% accuracy
• Used Typescript to automate various business logic and deployed it on AWS Lambda, which lowered the data processing time from 15 days to only 5 minutes
• Worked on the deployment of the frontend on AWS S3 and served it over AWS Cloudfront which made the website loading 25% quicker
• Deployed the backend service on different AWS EC2 servers and configured an application load balancer which made the servers 3x more available and scalable
• Using Github Actions, created CI/CD pipelines that made deployment 2x quicker

testimonials.text: Shreyansh has been a hard working developer right from the day 1 regardless of the project he works on.His technical capabilities will really help any firm that he works with.
testimonials.user: Himanshu Ranjan | SDE Intern @Practo | Backend | Android/Flutter | 4* @CodeChef
